results.name: Values (X + Y - Z) sorted on Z, then on Y, where (X,Y,Z) is a primitive Pythagorean triple with X<Y<Z.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pythagorean Triple.
xref: For ordered values of (X + Y - Z) see A020887.
results.author: _Lekraj Beedassy_, Oct 23 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _Ray Chandler_, Oct 25 2003
